name: puttering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
putter
putter verb
(MOVE)
[ I usually + adv/prep ] US (UK potter) to do things in a relaxed way, without rushing or trying very hard: He really enjoys puttering around in the garden.

putter verb
(MAKE NOISE)
[ I ] If a machine or engine putters, it makes a low sound repeatedly, showing that it is working slowly.
